Package com.comp2042.controller.guiControl

package com.comp2042.controller.guiControl
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GuiController
    Primary JavaFX controller for the single-player / local-multiplayer game view.
    GuiCountdown
    Small UI helper that encapsulates creation and lifecycle of a visual countdown used before game-start.
    GuiCountdownContext
    Context holder passed into the countdown helper to avoid long parameter lists.
    GuiCountdownController
    Helper to encapsulate the simple wiring required to start the game countdown overlay.
    GuiGameOverController
    Controller helpers for actions triggered from the game-over UI.
    GuiGameOverUI
    UI building helpers for the game-over overlay.
    GuiInitialize
    Small initialization helpers used by GuiController to keep the controller bootstrap code compact and testable.
    GuiOverlays
    UI builders for pause and controls overlays extracted from GuiController.
    GuiParticleHelpers
    Helper class for particle/visual effects previously living in GuiController.
    GuiViewHelpers
    Small companion helper for GUI view construction utilities extracted from GuiController.
